### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/T7_1.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/T7_1_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: T7.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T7.1.IM.mix**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.1.web.mix**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.1.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Anthromes-v2.0** (Klein Goldewijk K, van Drecht G  2006).
 - **EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0** (Tuanmu et al. 2014).
 - **EarthStat-Crops** (Ramankutty et al. 2008).
 - **Resolve-Ecoregions-2017** (Dinerstein et al. 2017).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|:-----------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Anthromes-v2.0          |<http://ecotope.org/anthromes/v2/data/>{target='links'} :: <https://earthdata.nasa.gov/learn/user-resources/who-uses-nasa-earth-science-data-user-profiles/user-profile-dr-navin-ramankutty>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/set/anthromes-anthropogenic-biomes-world-v1>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/collection/anthromes>{target='links'} |
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0 |<https://earthenv.org//landcover>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|EarthStat-Crops         |<http://www.earthstat.org/cropland-pasture-area-2000/>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/set/aglands-croplands-2000>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/set/aglands-pastures-2000>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                   |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017 |<https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/7b7fb9d945544d41b3e7a91494c42930_0>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**T7.1.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**T7.1.IM.mix** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**T7.1.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/T7.1.web.orig_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**T7.1.web.mix** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_1_web_mix){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

|:-----------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Anthromes-v2.0          |https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/set/anthromes-anthropogenic-biomes-world-v2-2000/metadata#Spatial_Reference_Information |
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0 |https://www.re3data.org/repository/r3d100013469 :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/                             |
|EarthStat-Crops         |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                                                   |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017 |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                                                   |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Ramankutty, N., A.T. Evan, C. Monfreda, and J.A. Foley (2008) *Farming the planet: 1. Geographic distribution of global agricultural lands in the year 2000* **Global Biogeochemical Cycles** 22, GB1003 [DOI:10.1029/2007GB002952](http:dx.doi.org/10.1029/2007GB002952) 
 - Klein Goldewijk K, van Drecht G (2006) *HYDE 3: current and historical population and land cover. Integrated modelling of global environmental change*. **An overview of IMAGE 2.4** (Eds AF Bouwman, T Kram K Klein Goldewijk), pp. 93–111. Netherlands Environmental Assessment Agency (MNP). Bilthoven, The Netherlands. 
 - Tuanmu, M.-N. and W. Jetz (2014) *A global 1-km consensus land-cover product for biodiversity and ecosystem modeling* **Global Ecology and Biogeography** 23(9):1031--1045 [DOI:10.1111/geb.12182](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/geb.12182) 
 - Dinerstein E, Olson D, Joshi A, Vynne C, Burgess ND, Wikramanayake E, Hahn N, Palminteri S, Hedao P, Noss R, Hansen M, Locke H, Ellis EE, Jones B, Barber CV, Hayes R, Kormos C, Martin V, Crist E, Sechrest W, Price L, Baillie JEM, Weeden D, Suckling K, Davis C, Sizer N, Moore R, Thau D, Birch T, Potapov P, Turubanova S, Tyukavina A, de Souza N, Pintea L, Brito JC, Llewellyn Barnekow Lillesø JP, van Breugel P, Graudal L, Voge M, Al-Shammari KF, Saleem M (2017) *An Ecoregion-Based Approach to Protecting Half the Terrestrial Realm*, **BioScience** 67: 534–545. DOI:[10.1093/biosci/bix014](https://doi.org/10.1093/biosci/bix014). [Data-set available on-line](https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/)
